description:
A new weapon for Gaia will be added.
Enjoy the new battle experience!

■Content
Weapon "Feline Paws"

■How to use
You can change weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".

*This content is only applicable to the WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate, it cannot be used in WARRIORS OROCHI 4 base game.
name: Weapon `Feline Paws`
